full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BRUM MA DANG BYIS PA'I MDON CHEN BCO LNGA'I GTOR CHOG BZHUGS SO, ,

colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI JANG JONG CHEN PO CHIN WANG GI MDA' DBANGS, ,GZO DANG GSO BA SOGS RIG PA'I YON TAN DANG THOS BSAM BSGOM PA TSUL HRIMS RNAMS KYI RGYUN GYI MDZES PAR LDAN PA, ,THUNG KA LAG PI LIG THU SLOB DPON BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN ZHES BGYIS BA 'DI LTA BU DGOS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA LA DGE BA YOD NA DE YIS, ,GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI DON 'GRUB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
